alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 2:37AM CDT until May 14 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Texas, including the following county, Palo Pinto. * WHEN...Until 545 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is ongoing or imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain has ended, but minor flooding may continue through the overnight hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mineral Wells, Gordon, Palo Pinto, Lake Palo Pinto, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Strawn, Mingus and Lone Camp.
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
